channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Trump ceasefire live: Deal looks uncertain as bombs continue to explode in the Middle East
item.description: Missiles have continued to fly in the Middle East despite President Trump's claim of a ceasefire deal
item.author: William Morgan
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, strikes, Iran-Israel conflict, Trump ceasefire, Israel-Iran conflict, Tehran strikes, Israeli Air Force

media:content.media:description: Multiple explosions were heard across Tehran in the hours after the ceasefire was brokered

media:thumbnail.media:description: Multiple explosions were heard across Tehran in the hours after the ceasefire was brokered

item.title: Breaking: Ceasefire deal between Israel and Iran announced by Trump
item.description: In a world teetering on the brink, a surprising announcement from President Trump hints at a fragile peace between two historic adversaries.
item.author: Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Middle East, Iran-Israel conflict, Israel-Iran ceasefire, US-Iran tensions, Middle East conflict

media:content.media:description: US President Donald Trump announced on Monday evening a ceasefire between Israel and Iran

media:thumbnail.media:description: US President Donald Trump announced on Monday evening a ceasefire between Israel and Iran

item.title: All flights cancelled across multiple airlines amid Iran WW3 fears - full list
item.description: British Airways has also been forced to cancel a number of flights in the Middle East amid the escalating conflict between Iran and Israel - full list here
item.author: Steven White,Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Middle East, Flights, Iran-Israel conflict, Iran-Israel tensions, Airline flight cancellations, Middle East conflict, Airspace safety concerns

media:content.media:description: Flight tracking website Flightradar24 currently shows no planes in the sky over a significant swathe of the Middle East

item.title: I predicted Israel-Iran war – 4 things will happen next as WW3 feared
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Brazilian seer Athos Salomé, known as the 'Living Nostradamus', has claimed his prediction of the conflict between Israel and Iran was spot on.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Iran-Israel conflict, Artificial Intelligence, World War 3, Iran, Israel, Middle East, Israel-Iran conflict, Athos Salomé, Living Nostradamus, Middle East military escalation, new surgical strikes, Iranian nuclear facilities, Fordow, energy crisis

media:content.media:description: Brazilian seer Athos Salomé, the Living Nostradamus, predicted an Israel-Iran conflict in 2023.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Brazilian seer Athos Salomé, the Living Nostradamus, predicted an Israel-Iran conflict in 2023.

item.title: Iran strikes mapped: The 8 air bases in Middle East on red alert for WW3

item.title: WW3 fears soar as Tehran threatens more attacks on US
item.description: Explosions were heard at a US airbase in Qatar and air defence missiles were seen in the sky as Iran launched 19 missiles.

item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Iran, Middle East, Israel, Iran-Israel conflict, iran strikes, iran missiles, donald trump

item.title: Iran launches huge missile attack on US airbase as explosions heard in Qatar
item.description: Iran has launched a missile attack on US airbases in Qatar and Iraq following US attacks on Iranian nuclear sites on Sunday.
item.author: Charlie Bradley,Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Iran, Donald Trump, Middle East, Iraq, Iran-Israel conflict, iran trump, trump iran. israel, israel iran, US air bases, missile attack, Middle East tensions, Al Udeid Air Base, sirens, air defences active, Iran missile attack, US airbase, Qatar airsp

item.title: Man fatally attacked by crocodile in front of family after ignoring warning signs
item.description: WARNING, GRAPHIC CONTENT: The 56-year-old man was dragged into a river by the 12-foot predator after he ignored warning signs and cast his fishing rod into the water
item.author: Zahra Khaliq

media:content.media:description: The man was attacked by an enormous crocodile (not pictured)
